mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_cd_spec.select */ SELECT cd_grp /* cd_grp 코드_그룹 character varying(40) */ ,cd_val /* cd_val 코드_값 character varying(40) */ ,cd_nm /* cd_nm 코드_명 character varying(100) */ ,cd_desc /* cd_desc 코드_설명 character varying(2000) */ ,fltr_val_1 /* fltr_val_1 필터_값_1 character varying(50) */ ,fltr_val_2 /* fltr_val_2 필터_값_2 character varying(50) */ ,fltr_val_3 /* fltr_val_3 필터_값_3 character varying(50) */ ,sort_ord /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */ ,use_yn /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tc_cd_spec WHERE 1 = 1 AND cd_grp = #{cdGrp} /* cd_grp 코드_그룹 character varying(40) */ AND cd_val = #{cdVal} /* cd_val 코드_값 character varying(40) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_cd_spec.insert */ INSERT INTO tc_cd_spec ( cd_grp /* cd_grp 코드_그룹 character varying(40) */ ,cd_val /* cd_val 코드_값 character varying(40) */

,cd_desc /* cd_desc 코드_설명 character varying(2000) */
,fltr_val_1 /* fltr_val_1 필터_값_1 character varying(50) */

,fltr_val_3 /* fltr_val_3 필터_값_3 character varying(50) */
,sort_ord /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */
,use_yn /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{cdGrp} /* cd_grp 코드_그룹 character varying(40) */ ,#{cdVal} /* cd_val 코드_값 character varying(40) */
,#{cdNm} /* cd_nm 코드_명 character varying(100) */
,#{cdDesc} /* cd_desc 코드_설명 character varying(2000) */
,#{fltrVal1} /* fltr_val_1 필터_값_1 character varying(50) */

,#{sortOrd} /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */
,#{useYn} /* use_yn 사용_여부 character(1) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_cd_spec.update */ UPDATE tc_cd_spec
,cd_nm = #{cdNm} /* cd_nm 코드_명 character varying(100) */
,cd_desc = #{cdDesc} /* cd_desc 코드_설명 character varying(2000) */

,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND cd_grp = #{cdGrp} /* cd_grp 코드_그룹 character varying(40) */ AND cd_val = #{cdVal} /* cd_val 코드_값 character varying(40) */
